title: UAE schools ban sugary food, fizzy drinks: Lunchbox guidelines, snacks rules parents and students should know
summary_full: UAE schools are implementing strict bans on sugary snacks and fizzy drinks from 2026 to boost student well-being and academic performance. Routine lunchbox checks and prohibitions on unhealthy deliveries are now in place. This initiative aims to combat rising childhood obesity and improve concentration, fostering healthier habits for a brighter future.
